about_the_game:
Bat to Bed is an addicting action game with 2 key twists that keep you going "Just ONE more run!"

1. Most punishing games are slow to gain progress and fast to lose it. This means that each mistake can cost you hours of playtime...

Bat to Bed isn't like that. In BtB, the levels are more like short, casual sprints, and you can regain your progress very quickly, which we've found makes it so much more approachable. Make no mistake, you WILL rage, but with some well-timed flaps you'll be back up there in no time.

2. Speedrunning and replayability are the core of the game's design. Once you beat the 1st level, you will feel empowered to take it on again and again to improve your Medal times, unlock Achievements and obtain the hardest-to-get Cosmetics that only dedicated players can earn.

THE STORY

The charming story follows a simple, sleepy purple bat that has somehow been tasked with saving the world. You will make the treacherous climb to the top of 5 levels, each with it's own unique art, music, mechanics and challenges.

We really hope you like Bat to Bed, and don't forget to wishlist before you go!
- Dylan and Jared
